Aaron Rodgers was all smiles yesterday as a guest on`` Late Show with David Letterman .'' David Letterman handed Aaron Rodgers his WWE championship belt and even caught a pass across the stage from the Super Bowl MVP. There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there, Aaron Rodgers said as his eyes scanned the crowd, which was met with cheers from the probable Packer backers in attendance. David Letterman asked a series of light-hearted questions, with Aaron Rodgers willingly playing along.

for the Lakers, but went 12-of-30 from the floor.`` We just played a good all-around game,'' Allen Iverson said after the Pistons won for the third time since his arrival from Denver five games ago. It's just about playing basketball, understanding what we want to do on the basketball court.`` We didn't feel like it would take long, but we knew it would be kind of shaky in the beginning because I'm a totally different player than Chauncey Billups . I'm a lot more aggressive when it comes to driving to the basket, so my teammates have to know what spot I want them to be in to be able to create shots for them. In winning their first seven, the Lakers had averaged a league-high 104.7 points and held opponents to a league-low 86.7. It's improper, it will stop now, it will not happen again and we will get our money back. Last year, for example, SIFMA lobbied against a bill that requires marketing intermediaries, who help investment funds win multibillion-dollar deals with state pension funds, to register as lobbyists with the state.
